game.name: Dynamons
game.description:
Creatures like Dynamons can make any world dangerous and pretty challenging. You were living in a calm and soothing place, but now have decided to go on an epic journey. Join Dynamons World and get ready to explore the untamed wilds like never before! Common friends! You are alone in this deadly place, but your friend Jovani will also be there to guide you during the fight against other precarious creatures in this brand new action-packed challenge. Help Dynamons to battle like a pro and show off the world that you are a true fighter!
Begin your adventure with a Dynamon with a few power controls, get some victory and improve the power of your character! Do not forget to catch a slew of new critters when you go. Upgrading your Dynamons will help to make it easy for you to challenge even the stronger opponents in this HTML5 fighting game! Provide your monsters with the needful training so that they can easily win the epic battles! Go to the other multiple creatures to recruit and fight against your enemies to become even more stronger than before!
Heal them whenever you find time and try to level up their abilities as fast as you can in this one of the best action games for boys! Challenges will become tougher as you progress. We are pretty sure that you have the abilities to guide your Dynamons through multiple levels and become the best captain of them all. Grab your pack and gear up to hit the road with a big enough Dynamons army! This Pokemon games inspired fun challenge features awesome graphics, easy controls and cool elements system.
